articles.title: Talks under way on long-range missiles, attack aircraft for Ukraine - Zelenskiy aide - Reuters

articles.content: KYIV, Feb 1 (Reuters) - A senior adviser to Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Wednesday talks were under way on securing longer-range missiles and attack aircraft from foreign partners … [+504 chars]

articles.title: ESA - Setting sail for safer space - European Space Agency
UK and EU reach post-Brexit customs deal for N.Ireland-The Times - Reuters
articles.description: Britain and the European Union have struck a customs deal that could help end post-Brexit wrangling over Northern Ireland, The Times newspaper said on Tuesday, and Brussels has also made a key concession on the European Court of Justice's (ECJ) role.
articles.content: LONDON, Jan 31 (Reuters) - Britain and the European Union have struck a customs deal that could help end post-Brexit wrangling over Northern Ireland, The Times newspaper said on Tuesday, and Brussels… [+1780 chars]

articles.author: Matt Honeycombe-Foster
articles.title: UK says ‘not practical’ to give Ukraine British fighter jets - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Downing Street says it will continue to ‘listen carefully’ to Ukrainian requests for support in war with Russia.
articles.content:
LONDON The British government has ruled out sending fighter jets to Ukraine for the time being.
Kyiv has in recent days stepped up its requests for jets after European allies agreed to supply battle… [+1358 chars]
